watched_movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
reviews: Mind-bending and visually stunning.
DiCaprio is fantastic in the lead role.
Nolan's direction is masterful, creating a complex and engaging plot.
The score by Hans Zimmer is iconic.
A modern sci-fi classic that requires multiple viewings.

watched_movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
reviews: A superhero masterpiece with a stellar performance by Heath Ledger.
Bale delivers a compelling Batman.
Nolan's direction is dark and gritty, perfectly capturing the tone of Gotham.
The action sequences are breathtaking.
Considered by many to be the greatest superhero film ever made.

watched_movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
reviews: A visually stunning and emotionally resonant space epic.
McConaughey gives a powerful performance.
Nolan tackles complex scientific concepts with grace and clarity.
The film explores themes of love, loss, and the human spirit.
A breathtaking cinematic experience that will leave you in awe.

watched_movies.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become Facebook, he is sued by twins Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss who claimed he stole their idea, and by his former friend Eduardo Saverin.
reviews: A brilliant and captivating film about the founding of Facebook.
Eisenberg delivers a phenomenal performance as Zuckerberg.
Fincher's direction is top-notch, creating a tense and engaging narrative.
The script is sharp and witty, exploring complex themes of ambition and betrayal.
A modern classic that accurately portrays the digital age.

watched_movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
reviews: A masterpiece of social satire and suspense.
Bong Joon-ho's direction is masterful.
The film is both hilarious and deeply disturbing.
A must-watch that will stay with you long after the credits roll.
Parasite is a truly original and unforgettable cinematic experience.

watched_movies.description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.
reviews: A satisfying and epic conclusion to the Avengers saga.
Full of action, emotion, and fan-service moments.
The performances are top-notch, especially Downey Jr.'s.
A must-see for any Marvel fan.
Endgame is a cinematic triumph that delivers on all fronts.

watched_movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
reviews: A visually stunning and intellectually stimulating sci-fi masterpiece.
Nolan's direction is ambitious and thought-provoking.
McConaughey delivers a powerful and emotional performance.
The film explores complex themes of time, space, and human connection.
Interstellar is a cinematic journey that will leave you in awe.

watched_movies.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
reviews: A chilling and suspenseful thriller that redefined the genre.
Hopkins' performance as Hannibal Lecter is iconic and terrifying.
Foster is brilliant as Clarice Starling.
Demme's direction creates a claustrophobic and unsettling atmosphere.
A timeless classic that remains as effective today as it was upon release.

watched_movies.description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles forty thousand dollars from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
reviews: Hitchcock's masterpiece of suspense and horror.
Perkins delivers a haunting performance as Norman Bates.
The shower scene is one of the most iconic moments in cinema history.
A groundbreaking film that continues to influence filmmakers today.
Psycho is a must-see for any fan of suspense and psychological thrillers.

watched_movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
reviews: Revolutionary and iconic sci-fi film.
The action sequences are groundbreaking.
Reeves is perfect as Neo.
A thought-provoking exploration of reality and choice.
A must-see for any sci-fi fan.

reviews: A genre-defining superhero film.
Ledger's Joker is iconic and unforgettable.
Dark, gritty, and emotionally resonant.
Elevates the superhero genre to new heights.
The Dark Knight is a cinematic triumph.

watched_movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
reviews: A powerful and heartbreaking portrayal of the Holocaust.
Spielberg's masterpiece, emotionally resonant and historically significant.
Neeson's performance is unforgettable.
A film that everyone should see to understand history.
Schindler's List is a testament to the resilience of the human spirit.

watched_movies.description: The story of King George VI of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, his impromptu ascension to the throne and the speech therapist who helped him overcome his stammer.
reviews: Inspiring and beautifully acted historical drama.
Firth and Rush are brilliant together.
A moving story of courage and determination.
The King's Speech is a wonderfully crafted and heartwarming film.
A must-see for fans of historical dramas.

watched_movies.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.
reviews: A magical and enchanting animated film.
Miyazaki's masterpiece, visually stunning and emotionally rich.
A timeless story that appeals to all ages.
Spirited Away is a cinematic treasure.
A must-watch for animation lovers.

watched_movies.description: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. But things become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.
reviews: Beautifully animated and emotionally resonant.
A touching and unforgettable story of connection and destiny.
Shinkai's visual style is breathtaking.
Your Name. is a modern anime classic.
A film that will leave you in awe and tears.
